channel.title: Drafts on Tomasz Pałucki

item.title: Interview Notes
item.description: Here is the selection of the interview questions that caught me unguarded, so I noted them not to forget What is an object’s hash code if hashCode() is not overridden? How to achieve object’s immutability? Design patterns: Decorator Factory method Data structures: Binary tree REST: GET vs PUT vs POST vs PATCH Richardson’s maturity model SQL: How does indexing work? Relational database introduction Tasks to train SQL queries UNION / UNION ALL - query result appending Subqueries Microservices:
